post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Actual distance between mine to his is about 2 km or less.
Mentally the distance was far. Only way to travel from mine to his was by auto vehicle.
Mean of transportation Pre summer : by Car only After summer : by Car or by Bicycle after witnessing of Scott’s bicycle trip to my home After my running class : by Car, by Bicycle, or on foot.
Span of about 4 months now I have few more options to travel to Scott’s home. Once I broke the mental wall of traveling Scott’s home by car only. Life is not better but it is little bit more enjoyable.
Pros Cons By car fast costly
By Bicycle good break no cost other than tire friction
On foot good excise no cost other than my increasing appetite
post.title: How far is from my home to Scott’s ?
